name: volunteer
chn: n. 志愿者; vi. & vt. 自愿做, 义务做, 无偿做
example_en: She decided to volunteer at the local animal shelter every weekend.
example_cn: 她决定每周末在当地动物收容所做志愿者。
memory_tips: 词根 'vol-' 来自拉丁语 'voluntas'，意为 '意愿' 或 '愿望'。联想记忆：想象一个充满热情的人自愿举起手来帮助他人。图像记忆：想象一个志愿者在社区中心帮助老人或小孩的场景。

image_prompt.main_image: A cheerful young person wearing a volunteer t-shirt, helping an elderly person cross the street in a sunny, urban setting.
image_prompt.example_image: A group of diverse volunteers working together in a community garden, planting flowers and vegetables, with a clear blue sky in the background.
